instruction: 请你接下来一步步思考，写出正确的SQL查询语句以满足用户的需求。
input:
你是一名MySQL专家，现在需要阅读并理解下面的【数据库schema】描述，以及可能用到的【参考信息】，并运用MySQL知识生成sql语句回答【用户问题】。
【用户问题】
在2008年中国大奖赛中，在完成比赛的车手中，有多少人参加过 Formula_1 分站比赛？

【数据库schema】
CREATE TABLE `circuits` (
  `circuitId` BIGINT COMMENT 'unique identification number of the circuit',
  `circuitRef` TEXT COMMENT 'circuit reference name',
  `name` TEXT COMMENT 'full name of circuit',
  `location` TEXT COMMENT 'location of circuit',
  `country` TEXT COMMENT 'country of circuit',
  `lat` DOUBLE COMMENT 'latitude of location of circuit',
  `lng` DOUBLE COMMENT 'longitude of location of circuit; commonsense evidence: 
Location coordinates: (lat, lng)',
  `alt` BIGINT COMMENT 'not useful',
  `url` TEXT COMMENT 'url'
);
CREATE TABLE `constructorResults` (
  `constructorResultsId` BIGINT COMMENT 'constructor Results Id',
  `raceId` BIGINT COMMENT 'race id',
  `constructorId` BIGINT COMMENT 'constructor id',
  `points` DOUBLE COMMENT 'points',
  `status` TEXT COMMENT 'status'
);
CREATE TABLE `constructorStandings` (
  `constructorStandingsId` BIGINT COMMENT 'unique identification of the constructor standing records',
  `raceId` BIGINT COMMENT 'id number identifying which races',
  `constructorId` BIGINT COMMENT 'id number identifying which id',
  `points` TEXT COMMENT 'how many points acquired in each race',
  `position` BIGINT COMMENT 'position or track of circuits',
  `positionText` TEXT COMMENT 'same with position, not quite useful',
  `wins` BIGINT COMMENT 'wins'
);
CREATE TABLE `constructors` (
  `constructorId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identification number identifying constructors',
  `constructorRef` TEXT COMMENT 'Constructor Reference name',
  `name` TEXT COMMENT 'full name of the constructor',
  `nationality` TEXT COMMENT 'nationality of the constructor',
  `url` TEXT COMMENT 'the introduction website of the constructor; commonsense evidence: 
How to find out the detailed introduction of the constructor: through its url',
  `wins` BIGINT COMMENT 'wins'
);
CREATE TABLE `driverStandings` (
  `driverStandingsId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identification number identifying driver standing records',
  `raceId` BIGINT COMMENT 'id number identifying which races',
  `driverId` BIGINT COMMENT 'id number identifying which drivers',
  `points` DOUBLE COMMENT 'how many points acquired in each race',
  `position` BIGINT COMMENT 'position or track of circuits',
  `positionText` TEXT COMMENT 'same with position, not quite useful',
  `wins` BIGINT COMMENT 'wins'
);
CREATE TABLE `drivers` (
  `driverId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identification number identifying each driver',
  `driverRef` TEXT COMMENT 'driver reference name',
  `number` BIGINT COMMENT 'number',
  `code` TEXT COMMENT 'abbreviated code for drivers; if "null" or empty, it means it doesnt have code',
  `forename` TEXT COMMENT 'forename',
  `surname` TEXT COMMENT 'surname',
  `dob` TEXT COMMENT 'date of birth',
  `nationality` TEXT COMMENT 'nationality of drivers',
  `url` TEXT COMMENT 'the introduction website of the drivers'
);
CREATE TABLE `lapTimes` (
  `raceId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the identification number identifying race',
  `driverId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the identification number identifying each driver',
  `lap` BIGINT COMMENT 'lap number',
  `position` BIGINT COMMENT 'position or track of circuits',
  `time` TEXT COMMENT 'lap time; in minutes / seconds / ...',
  `milliseconds` BIGINT COMMENT 'milliseconds'
);
CREATE TABLE `pitStops` (
  `raceId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the identification number identifying race',
  `driverId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the identification number identifying each driver',
  `stop` BIGINT COMMENT 'stop number',
  `lap` BIGINT COMMENT 'lap number',
  `time` TEXT COMMENT 'time; exact time',
  `duration` TEXT COMMENT 'duration time; seconds/',
  `milliseconds` BIGINT COMMENT 'milliseconds'
);
CREATE TABLE `qualifying` (
  `qualifyId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identification number identifying qualifying; How does F1 Sprint qualifying work? Sprint qualifying is essentially a short-form Grand Prix  a race that is one-third the number of laps of the main event on Sunday. However, the drivers are battling for positions on the grid for the start of Sundays race.',
  `raceId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the identification number identifying each race',
  `driverId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the identification number identifying each driver',
  `constructorId` BIGINT COMMENT 'constructor Id',
  `number` BIGINT COMMENT 'number',
  `position` BIGINT COMMENT 'position or track of circuit',
  `q1` TEXT COMMENT 'time in qualifying 1; in minutes / seconds / ... 
commonsense evidence: 
Q1 lap times determine pole position and the order of the front 10 positions on the grid. The slowest driver in Q1 starts 10th, the next starts ninth and so on. 
All 20 F1 drivers participate in the first period, called Q1, with each trying to set the fastest time possible. Those in the top 15 move on to the next period of qualifying, called Q2. The five slowest drivers are eliminated and will start the race in the last five positions on the grid.',
  `q2` TEXT COMMENT 'time in qualifying 2; in minutes / seconds / ... 
commonsense evidence: 
only top 15 in the q1 has the record of q2 
Q2 is slightly shorter but follows the same format. Drivers try to put down their best times to move on to Q1 as one of the 10 fastest cars. The five outside of the top 10 are eliminated and start the race from 11th to 15th based on their best lap time.',
  `q3` TEXT COMMENT 'time in qualifying 3; in minutes / seconds / ... 
commonsense evidence: 
only top 10 in the q2 has the record of q3'
);

CREATE TABLE `results` (
  `resultId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identification number identifying race result',
  `raceId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the identification number identifying the race',
  `driverId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the identification number identifying the driver',
  `constructorId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the identification number identifying which constructors',
  `number` BIGINT COMMENT 'number',
  `grid` BIGINT COMMENT 'the number identifying the area where cars are set into a grid formation in order to start the race.',
  `position` BIGINT COMMENT 'The finishing position or track of circuits',
  `positionText` TEXT COMMENT 'not quite useful',
  `positionOrder` BIGINT COMMENT 'the finishing order of positions',
  `points` DOUBLE COMMENT 'points',
  `laps` BIGINT COMMENT 'lap number',
  `time` TEXT COMMENT 'finish time; commonsense evidence: 
1. if the value exists, it means the driver finished the race. 
2. Only the time of the champion shows in the format of "minutes: seconds.millionsecond", the time of the other drivers shows as "seconds.millionsecond" , which means their actual time is the time of the champion adding the value in this cell.',
  `milliseconds` BIGINT COMMENT 'the actual finishing time of drivers in milliseconds; the actual finishing time of drivers',
  `fastestLap` BIGINT COMMENT 'fastest lap number',
  `rank` BIGINT COMMENT 'starting rank positioned by fastest lap speed',
  `fastestLapTime` TEXT COMMENT 'fastest Lap Time; faster (smaller in the value) "fastestLapTime" leads to higher rank (smaller is higher rank)',
  `fastestLapSpeed` TEXT COMMENT 'fastest Lap Speed; (km / h)',
  `statusId` BIGINT COMMENT 'status ID; its category description appear in the table status'
);
CREATE TABLE `seasons` (
  `year` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identification number identifying the race',
  `url` TEXT COMMENT 'website link of season race introduction'
);
CREATE TABLE `status` (
  `statusId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identification number identifying status',
  `status` TEXT COMMENT 'full name of status'
);

【参考信息】
条件 COUNT(raceID) > 0 表明该车手参与过分站比赛；完成比赛的车手是指其 time 字段有值。

【用户问题】
在2008年中国大奖赛中，在完成比赛的车手中，有多少人参加过 Formula_1 分站比赛？
output: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT `T1`.`driverId` FROM `results` AS `T1` INNER JOIN `races` AS `T2` ON `T1`.`raceId` = `T2`.`raceId` WHERE `T2`.`name` = 'Chinese Grand Prix' AND `T2`.`year` = 2008 AND `T1`.`time` IS NOT NULL GROUP BY `T1`.`driverId` HAVING COUNT(`T2`.`raceId`) > 0) AS derived_table

meta.original_question: Among the drivers that finished the race in the 2008 Chinese Grand Prix, how many of them have participated in Formula_1 races?
meta.original_evidence: COUNT(raceID) > 0 reveals that this driver participated in races; drivers who finished the race refers to time has value.

【参考信息】
快的百分比 = divide(subtract(增量时间, 冠军时间), 最后一名车手时间) * 100; 最后一名车手完赛时间 = 增量时间 + 冠军时间; 只有冠军的完赛时间以'HH:MM:SS.mmm'格式表示; 完赛是指time不为null

【用户问题】
2008年澳大利亚大奖赛中,冠军比最后完赛的车手快了百分之多少?
output:
WITH `time_in_seconds` AS (
  SELECT
    `T1`.`positionOrder`,
    CASE
      WHEN `T1`.`positionOrder` = 1
      THEN (
        CAST(SUBSTR(`T1`.`time`, 1, 1) AS DOUBLE) * 3600
      ) + (
        CAST(SUBSTR(`T1`.`time`, 3, 2) AS DOUBLE) * 60
      ) + CAST(SUBSTR(`T1`.`time`, 6) AS DOUBLE)
      ELSE CAST(SUBSTR(`T1`.`time`, 2) AS DOUBLE)
    END AS `time_seconds`
  FROM `results` AS `T1`
  INNER JOIN `races` AS `T2`
    ON `T1`.`raceId` = `T2`.`raceId`
  WHERE
    `T2`.`name` = 'Australian Grand Prix'
    AND NOT `T1`.`time` IS NULL
    AND `T2`.`year` = 2008
), `champion_time` AS (
  SELECT
    `time_seconds`
  FROM `time_in_seconds`
  WHERE
    `positionOrder` = 1
), `last_driver_incremental` AS (
  SELECT
    `time_seconds`
  FROM `time_in_seconds`
  WHERE
    `positionOrder` = (
      SELECT
        MAX(`positionOrder`)
      FROM `time_in_seconds`
    )
)
SELECT
  (
    CAST((
      SELECT
        `time_seconds`
      FROM `last_driver_incremental`
    ) AS DOUBLE) * 100
  ) / (
    SELECT
      `time_seconds` + (
        SELECT
          `time_seconds`
        FROM `last_driver_incremental`
      )
    FROM `champion_time`
  )

meta.original_question: How much faster in percentage is the champion than the driver who finished the race last in the 2008 Australian Grand Prix?
meta.original_evidence: how much faster in percentage = divide(subtract(incremental time, champion time), last_driver time) * 100; last driver finished time = incremental time + champion time; only champion's finished time is represented by 'HH:MM:SS.mmm'; finished the game refers to time is not null
meta.question_cn: 2008年澳大利亚大奖赛中,冠军比最后完赛的车手快了百分之多少?

2007年至2009年是指year在2007和2009之间；完赛是指time不为null；百分比 = 除法(COUNT(DriverID其中time不为null且year在2007和2009之间),COUNT(DriverID其中year在2007和2009之间))*100;

【用户问题】
请计算2007年至2009年期间日本车手的完赛百分比。
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN NOT `T1`.`time` IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`T1`.`raceId`)
FROM `results` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `races` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`raceId` = `T2`.`raceId`
INNER JOIN `drivers` AS `T3`
  ON `T1`.`driverId` = `T3`.`driverId`
WHERE
  `T3`.`nationality` = 'Japanese' AND `T2`.`year` BETWEEN 2007 AND 2009

meta.original_evidence: from 2007 to 2009 refers to year between 2007 and 2009; race completion refers to time is not null; percentage = Divide(COUNT(DriverID where time is not null and year between 2007 and 2009),Count (DriverID where year between 2007 and 2009))*100;

【参考信息】
只有冠军的完成时间采用'HH:MM:SS.mmm'格式表示；完成比赛指time不为null；1975年之前指year < 1975；

【用户问题】
1975年之前，每年冠军的平均完成时间（以秒计）是多少？
output: WITH time_in_seconds AS (SELECT T2.year, T2.raceId, T1.positionOrder, CASE WHEN T1.positionOrder = 1 THEN (CAST(SUBSTR(T1.time, 1, 1) AS FLOAT) * 3600) + (CAST(SUBSTR(T1.time, 3, 2) AS FLOAT) * 60) + CAST(SUBSTR(T1.time, 6, 2) AS FLOAT) + CAST(SUBSTR(T1.time, 9) AS FLOAT) / 1000 ELSE 0 END AS time_seconds FROM results AS T1 INNER JOIN races AS T2 ON T1.raceId = T2.raceId WHERE NOT T1.time IS NULL), champion_time AS (SELECT year, raceId, time_seconds FROM time_in_seconds WHERE positionOrder = 1) SELECT year, AVG(time_seconds) FROM champion_time WHERE year < 1975 GROUP BY year HAVING NOT AVG(time_seconds) IS NULL

meta.original_question: What is the average time in seconds of champion for each year, before year 1975?
meta.original_evidence: only champion's finished time is represented by 'HH:MM:SS.mmm'; finished the game refers to time is not null; before year 1975 refers to year < 1975;
meta.question_cn: 1975年之前，每年冠军的平均完成时间（以秒计）是多少？
meta.evidence_cn: 只有冠军的完成时间采用'HH:MM:SS.mmm'格式表示；完成比赛指time不为null；1975年之前指year < 1975；

【参考信息】
出生年份在1985年之前指 year(dob)<1985；2000年到2005年指 year between 2000 and 2005；百分比 = Divide(COUNT(driverId where year (dob) <1985 and laps >50),COUNT(DriverID where year between 2000 and 2005) *100

【用户问题】
从2000年到2005年，出生年份在1985年之前且圈数超过50的驾驶员占比是多少？
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(
    CASE
      WHEN DATE_FORMAT(CAST(`T3`.`dob` AS DATETIME), '%Y') < '1985' AND `T1`.`laps` > 50
      THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END
  ) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(*)
FROM `results` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `races` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`raceId` = `T2`.`raceId`
INNER JOIN `drivers` AS `T3`
  ON `T1`.`driverId` = `T3`.`driverId`
WHERE
  `T2`.`year` BETWEEN 2000 AND 2005

meta.original_question: From 2000 to 2005, what percentage of drivers who were born before 1985 and the lap numbers were over 50?
meta.original_evidence: born before 1985 refers to year(dob)<1985; in 2000 to 2005 refers to year between 2000 and 2005; percentage = Divide(COUNT(driverId where year (dob) <1985 and laps >50),COUNT(DriverID where year between 2000 and 2005) *100;
meta.question_cn: 从2000年到2005年，出生年份在1985年之前且圈数超过50的驾驶员占比是多少？

单圈时间少于 02:00.00 指的是秒数 < 120;

【用户问题】
有多少名法国车手的单圈时间少于 02:00.00？
output:
SELECT
  COUNT(`T1`.`driverId`)
FROM `drivers` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `lapTimes` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`driverId` = `T2`.`driverId`
WHERE
  `T1`.`nationality` = 'French'
  AND (
    CAST(SUBSTR(`T2`.`time`, 1, 2) AS SIGNED) * 60 + CAST(SUBSTR(`T2`.`time`, 4, 2) AS SIGNED) + CAST(SUBSTR(`T2`.`time`, 7, 2) AS DOUBLE) / 1000
  ) < 120

meta.original_evidence: lap time less than 02:00.00 refers to seconds < 120;

meta.evidence_cn: 单圈时间少于 02:00.00 指的是秒数 < 120;

【用户问题】
最年轻的车手在哪一年进行了他的首次排位赛？同时说明该比赛的名称、日期和时间。
output:
SELECT
  `T3`.`year`,
  `T3`.`name`,
  `T3`.`date`,
  `T3`.`time`
FROM `qualifying` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `drivers` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`driverId` = `T2`.`driverId`
INNER JOIN `races` AS `T3`
  ON `T1`.`raceId` = `T3`.`raceId`
WHERE
  `T1`.`driverId` = (
    SELECT
      `driverId`
    FROM `drivers`
    ORDER BY
      `dob` DESC
    LIMIT 1
  )
ORDER BY
  `T3`.`date` ASC
LIMIT 1

【用户问题】
列出出生于1980-1985年间，平均进站时间最短的前3名德国车手。
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`forename`,
  `T2`.`surname`
FROM `pitStops` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `drivers` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`driverId` = `T2`.`driverId`
WHERE
  `T2`.`nationality` = 'German'
  AND DATE_FORMAT(CAST(`T2`.`dob` AS DATETIME), '%Y') BETWEEN '1980' AND '1985'
GROUP BY
  `T2`.`forename`,
  `T2`.`surname`
ORDER BY
  AVG(`T1`.`duration`)
LIMIT 3

CREATE TABLE `qualifying` (
  `qualifyId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identification number identifying qualifying; How does F1 Sprint qualifying work? Sprint qualifying is essentially a short-form Grand Prix  a race that is one-third the number of laps of the main event on Sunday. However, the drivers are battling for positions on the grid for the start of Sundays race.',
  `raceId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the identification number identifying each race',
  `driverId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the identification number identifying each driver',
  `constructorId` BIGINT COMMENT 'constructor Id',
  `number` BIGINT COMMENT 'number',
  `position` BIGINT COMMENT 'position or track of circuit',

Q1 lap times determine pole position and the order of the front 10 positions on the grid. The slowest driver in Q1 starts 10th, the next starts ninth and so on. 
All 20 F1 drivers participate in the first period, called Q1, with each trying to set the fastest time possible. Those in the top 15 move on to the next period of qualifying, called Q2. The five slowest drivers are eliminated and will start the race in the last five positions on the grid.',
  `q2` TEXT COMMENT 'time in qualifying 2; in minutes / seconds / ... 
commonsense evidence: 
only top 15 in the q1 has the record of q2 
Q2 is slightly shorter but follows the same format. Drivers try to put down their best times to move on to Q1 as one of the 10 fastest cars. The five outside of the top 10 are eliminated and start the race from 11th to 15th based on their best lap time.',
  `q3` TEXT COMMENT 'time in qualifying 3; in minutes / seconds / ... 
commonsense evidence: 
only top 10 in the q2 has the record of q3'

1. if the value exists, it means the driver finished the race. 
2. Only the time of the champion shows in the format of "minutes: seconds.millionsecond", the time of the other drivers shows as "seconds.millionsecond" , which means their actual time is the time of the champion adding the value in this cell.',

CREATE TABLE `seasons` (
  `year` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identification number identifying the race',

);
CREATE TABLE `status` (
  `statusId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identification number identifying status',

只有冠军的时间以"小时:分钟:秒.毫秒"的格式显示；

output:

INNER JOIN `races` AS `T2`

WHERE
  `T2`.`name` = 'Canadian Grand Prix'

instruction: 请你接下来一步步思考，写出正确的SQL查询语句以满足用户的需求。
input:
你是一名MySQL专家，现在需要阅读并理解下面的【数据库schema】描述，以及可能用到的【参考信息】，并运用MySQL知识生成sql语句回答【用户问题】。
【用户问题】
请列出3-D Man的所有超能力。

【数据库schema】
CREATE TABLE `alignment` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identifier of the alignment',
  `alignment` TEXT COMMENT 'the alignment of the superhero; commonsense evidence:
Alignment refers to a characters moral and ethical stance and can be used to describe the overall attitude or behavior of a superhero. Some common alignments for superheroes include:
Good: These superheroes are typically kind, selfless, and dedicated to protecting others and upholding justice. Examples of good alignments include Superman, Wonder Woman, and Spider-Man.
Neutral: These superheroes may not always prioritize the greater good, but they are not necessarily evil either. They may act in their own self-interest or make decisions based on their own moral code. Examples of neutral alignments include the Hulk and Deadpool.
	Bad: These superheroes are typically selfish, manipulative, and willing to harm others in pursuit of their own goals. Examples of evil alignments include Lex Luthor and the Joker.'
);
CREATE TABLE `attribute` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identifier of the attribute',
  `attribute_name` TEXT COMMENT 'the attribute; commonsense evidence:
A superheros attribute is a characteristic or quality that defines who they are and what they are capable of. This could be a physical trait, such as superhuman strength or the ability to fly, or a personal trait, such as extraordinary intelligence or exceptional bravery.'
);
CREATE TABLE `colour` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identifier of the color',
  `colour` TEXT COMMENT 'the color of the superheros skin/eye/hair/etc'
);
CREATE TABLE `gender` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identifier of the gender',
  `gender` TEXT COMMENT 'the gender of the superhero'
);
CREATE TABLE `hero_attribute` (
  `hero_id` TEXT COMMENT 'the id of the hero
Maps to superhero(id)',
  `attribute_id` TEXT COMMENT 'the id of the attribute
Maps to attribute(id)',
  `attribute_value` TEXT COMMENT 'the attribute value; commonsense evidence:
If a superhero has a higher attribute value on a particular attribute, it means that they are more skilled or powerful in that area compared to other superheroes. For example, if a superhero has a higher attribute value for strength, they may be able to lift heavier objects or deliver more powerful punches than other superheroes.'
);
CREATE TABLE `hero_power` (
  `hero_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the hero
Maps to superhero(id)',
  `power_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the power
Maps to superpower(id); commonsense evidence:
In general, a superheros attributes provide the foundation for their abilities and help to define who they are, while their powers are the specific abilities that they use to fight crime and protect others.'
);
CREATE TABLE `publisher` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identifier of the publisher',
  `publisher_name` TEXT COMMENT 'the name of the publisher'
);
CREATE TABLE `race` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identifier of the race',
  `race` TEXT COMMENT 'the race of the superhero; commonsense evidence:
In the context of superheroes, a superheros race would refer to the particular group of people that the superhero belongs to base on these physical characteristics'
);
CREATE TABLE `superhero` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identifier of the superhero',
  `superhero_name` TEXT COMMENT 'the name of the superhero',
  `full_name` TEXT COMMENT 'the full name of the superhero; commonsense evidence:
The full name of a person typically consists of their given name, also known as their first name or personal name, and their surname, also known as their last name or family name. For example, if someones given name is "John" and their surname is "Smith," their full name would be "John Smith."',
  `gender_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the superheros gender',
  `eye_colour_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the superheros eye color',
  `hair_colour_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the superheros hair color',
  `skin_colour_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the superheros skin color',
  `race_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the superheros race',
  `publisher_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the publisher',
  `alignment_id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the superheros alignment',
  `height_cm` BIGINT COMMENT 'the height of the superhero; commonsense evidence:
The unit of height is centimeter. If the height_cm is NULL or 0, it means the height of the superhero is missing.',
  `weight_kg` BIGINT COMMENT 'the weight of the superhero; commonsense evidence:
The unit of weight is kilogram. If the weight_kg is NULL or 0, it means the weight of the superhero is missing.'
);
CREATE TABLE `superpower` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identifier of the superpower',
  `power_name` TEXT COMMENT 'the superpower name'
);

【参考信息】
3-D Man指superhero_name = '3-D Man'；超能力指power_name

【用户问题】
请列出3-D Man的所有超能力。
output: SELECT  `T3`.`power_name` FROM `superhero` AS `T1` INNER JOIN `hero_power` AS `T2`  ON `T1`.`id` = `T2`.`hero_id` INNER JOIN `superpower` AS `T3`  ON `T2`.`power_id` = `T3`.`id` WHERE  `T1`.`superhero_name` = '3-D Man'

meta.original_question: Please list all the superpowers of 3-D Man.
meta.original_evidence: 3-D Man refers to superhero_name = '3-D Man'; superpowers refers to power_name
meta.question_cn: 请列出3-D Man的所有超能力。
meta.evidence_cn: 3-D Man指superhero_name = '3-D Man'；超能力指power_name

SELECT
  SUM(`T1`.`points`),
  `T2`.`name`,

FROM `constructorResults` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `constructors` AS `T2`

WHERE

【用户问题】
在2008年滨海湾街道赛道举行的第3场排位赛中，排名第1的赛车手的全名是什么？

SELECT
  `T2`.`forename`,
  `T2`.`surname`
FROM `qualifying` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `drivers` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`driverId` = `T2`.`driverId`
INNER JOIN `races` AS `T3`
  ON `T1`.`raceid` = `T3`.`raceid`
WHERE
  NOT `q3` IS NULL
  AND `T3`.`year` = 2008
  AND `T3`.`circuitId` IN (
    SELECT
      `circuitId`
    FROM `circuits`
    WHERE
      `name` = 'Marina Bay Street Circuit'
  )
ORDER BY
  CAST(SUBSTR(`q3`, 1, INSTR(`q3`, ':') - 1) AS SIGNED) * 60 + CAST(SUBSTR(`q3`, INSTR(`q3`, ':') + 1, INSTR(`q3`, '.') - INSTR(`q3`, ':') - 1) AS DOUBLE) + CAST(SUBSTR(`q3`, INSTR(`q3`, '.') + 1) AS DOUBLE) / 1000 ASC
LIMIT 1

最短单圈时间指 MIN(time)；最短单圈时间的时间格式为 'MM:SS.mmm' 或 'M:SS.mmm'；车手的全名指 forename, surname

【用户问题】
哪位排名前20的车手在一级方程式比赛中创造了有史以来最短的单圈时间？请给出他们的全名。
output: WITH lap_times_in_seconds AS (SELECT driverId, (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(time, 1, INSTR(time, ':') - 1) <> '' THEN CAST(SUBSTR(time, 1, INSTR(time, ':') - 1) AS FLOAT) * 60 ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN SUBSTR(time, INSTR(time, ':') + 1, INSTR(time, '.') - INSTR(time, ':') - 1) <> '' THEN CAST(SUBSTR(time, INSTR(time, ':') + 1, INSTR(time, '.') - INSTR(time, ':') - 1) AS FLOAT) ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN SUBSTR(time, INSTR(time, '.') + 1) <> '' THEN CAST(SUBSTR(time, INSTR(time, '.') + 1) AS FLOAT) / 1000 ELSE 0 END) AS time_in_seconds FROM lapTimes) SELECT T2.forename, T2.surname, T1.driverId FROM (SELECT driverId, MIN(time_in_seconds) AS min_time_in_seconds FROM lap_times_in_seconds GROUP BY driverId) AS T1 INNER JOIN drivers AS T2 ON T1.driverId = T2.driverId ORDER BY T1.min_time_in_seconds ASC LIMIT 20

meta.original_question: Which top 20 driver created the shortest lap time ever record in a Formula_1 race? Please give them full names.
meta.original_evidence: shortest lap time refers to MIN(time); the time format for the shortest lap time is 'MM:SS.mmm' or 'M:SS.mmm'; full name of the driver refers to forename, surname

圈速记录是指记录的最快时间，指的是时间

【用户问题】
请列出意大利赛道的圈速记录。
output:
WITH `fastest_lap_times` AS (
  SELECT
    `T1`.`raceId`,
    `T1`.`FastestLapTime`,
    (
      CAST(SUBSTR(`T1`.`FastestLapTime`, 1, INSTR(`T1`.`FastestLapTime`, ':') - 1) AS DOUBLE) * 60
    ) + (
      CAST(SUBSTR(
        `T1`.`FastestLapTime`,
        INSTR(`T1`.`FastestLapTime`, ':') + 1,
        INSTR(`T1`.`FastestLapTime`, '.') - INSTR(`T1`.`FastestLapTime`, ':') - 1
      ) AS DOUBLE)
    ) + (
      CAST(SUBSTR(`T1`.`FastestLapTime`, INSTR(`T1`.`FastestLapTime`, '.') + 1) AS DOUBLE) / 1000
    ) AS `time_in_seconds`
  FROM `results` AS `T1`
  WHERE
    NOT `T1`.`FastestLapTime` IS NULL
)
SELECT
  `T1`.`FastestLapTime` AS `lap_record`
FROM `results` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `races` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`raceId` = `T2`.`raceId`
INNER JOIN `circuits` AS `T3`
  ON `T2`.`circuitId` = `T3`.`circuitId`
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT
    MIN(`fastest_lap_times`.`time_in_seconds`) AS `min_time_in_seconds`
  FROM `fastest_lap_times`
  INNER JOIN `races` AS `T2`
    ON `fastest_lap_times`.`raceId` = `T2`.`raceId`
  INNER JOIN `circuits` AS `T3`
    ON `T2`.`circuitId` = `T3`.`circuitId`
  WHERE
    `T3`.`country` = 'Italy'
) AS `T4`
  ON (
    CAST(SUBSTR(`T1`.`FastestLapTime`, 1, INSTR(`T1`.`FastestLapTime`, ':') - 1) AS DOUBLE) * 60
  ) + (
    CAST(SUBSTR(
      `T1`.`FastestLapTime`,
      INSTR(`T1`.`FastestLapTime`, ':') + 1,
      INSTR(`T1`.`FastestLapTime`, '.') - INSTR(`T1`.`FastestLapTime`, ':') - 1
    ) AS DOUBLE)
  ) + (
    CAST(SUBSTR(`T1`.`FastestLapTime`, INSTR(`T1`.`FastestLapTime`, '.') + 1) AS DOUBLE) / 1000
  ) = `T4`.`min_time_in_seconds`
LIMIT 1

input:
你是一名MySQL专家，现在需要阅读并理解下面的【数据库schema】描述，以及可能用到的【参考信息】，并运用MySQL知识生成sql语句回答【用户问题】。
【用户问题】
在具有"超级力量"超能力的超级英雄中，有多少人的身高超过200厘米?

【数据库schema】
CREATE TABLE `alignment` (
  `id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique identifier of the alignment',
  `alignment` TEXT COMMENT 'the alignment of the superhero; commonsense evidence:

FROM `superhero` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `gender` AS `T2`

WHERE

The score is from 0 to 100. The score more than 60 refers that the comment is a positive comment. The score less than 60 refers that the comment is a negative comment.',
  `Text` TEXT COMMENT 'the detailed content of the comment',
  `CreationDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the creation date of the comment',
  `UserId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the user who post the comment',

);

);

);
CREATE TABLE `posts` (
  `Id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the post id',
  `PostTypeId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the post type',
  `AcceptedAnswerId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the accepted answer id of the post',
  `CreaionDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the creation date of the post',
  `Score` BIGINT COMMENT 'the score of the post',
  `ViewCount` BIGINT COMMENT 'the view count of the post; commonsense evidence:
Higher view count means the post has higher popularity',
  `Body` TEXT COMMENT 'the body of the post',
  `OwnerUserId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the owner user',
  `LasActivityDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the last activity date',
  `Title` TEXT COMMENT 'the title of the post',
  `Tags` TEXT COMMENT 'the tag of the post',
  `AnswerCount` BIGINT COMMENT 'the total number of answers of the post',
  `CommentCount` BIGINT COMMENT 'the total number of comments of the post',
  `FavoriteCount` BIGINT COMMENT 'the total number of favorites of the post; commonsense evidence:
more favorite count refers to more valuable posts.',
  `LastEditorUserId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the last editor',
  `LastEditDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the last edit date',
  `CommunityOwnedDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the community owned date',
  `ParentId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the parent post; commonsense evidence:
If the parent id is null, the post is the root post. Otherwise, the post is the child post of other post.',
  `ClosedDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the closed date of the post; commonsense evidence:
if ClosedDate is null or empty, it means this post is not well-finished
if CloseDate is not null or empty, it means this post has well-finished.',
  `OwnerDisplayName` TEXT COMMENT 'the display name of the post owner',
  `LastEditorDisplayName` TEXT COMMENT 'the display name of the last editor'
);
CREATE TABLE `tags` (
  `Id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the tag id',
  `TagName` TEXT COMMENT 'the name of the tag',
  `Count` BIGINT COMMENT 'the count of posts that contain this tag; more counts --> this tag is more popular',
  `ExcerptPostId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the excerpt post id of the tag',
  `WikiPostId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the wiki post id of the tag'
);
CREATE TABLE `users` (

The user with higher reputation has more influence.',

  `UpVotes` BIGINT COMMENT 'the number of upvotes',

);

  `CreationDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the creation date of the vote',
  `UserId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the voter',
  `BountyAmount` BIGINT COMMENT 'the amount of bounty'
);

【参考信息】
"Harlan" 和 "Jarrod Dixon" 都是 DisplayName；最高声誉指的是 Max(Reputation)

【用户问题】
哪个用户的声誉更高，Harlan 还是 Jarrod Dixon?
output:
SELECT
  `DisplayName`
FROM `users`
WHERE
  `DisplayName` IN ('Harlan', 'Jarrod Dixon')
  AND `Reputation` = (
    SELECT
      MAX(`Reputation`)
    FROM `users`
    WHERE
      `DisplayName` IN ('Harlan', 'Jarrod Dixon')
  )

meta.original_question: Which user has a higher reputation, Harlan or Jarrod Dixon?
meta.original_evidence: "Harlan" and "Jarrod Dixon" are both DisplayName; highest reputation refers to Max(Reputation)
meta.question_cn: 哪个用户的声誉更高，Harlan 还是 Jarrod Dixon?
meta.evidence_cn: "Harlan" 和 "Jarrod Dixon" 都是 DisplayName；最高声誉指的是 Max(Reputation)

  AVG(`T1`.`UpVotes`),
  AVG(`T1`.`Age`)
FROM `users` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN (

DIVIDE(COUNT(PostId WHERE TagName = 'r')), (COUNT(PostId WHERE DisplayName = 'Community')) as percentage; R语言指的是tagname = 'r'

SELECT

calculation = DIVIDE(COUNT(Id，其中 YEAR(CreationDate) = 2010 且 AnswerCount <= 2)，12)

对于那些回答数不超过 2 个的帖子，在 2010 年中每月平均创建的链接数量是多少？

SELECT

FROM `postLinks` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `posts` AS `T2`

  `T2`.`AnswerCount` <= 2

【参考信息】
用户的声誉越高，影响力就越大；百分比 = DIVIDE(COUNT(stats_posts.Id where Score > 50 and MAX(Reputation))), COUNT(stats_posts.Id where MAX(Reputation));

【用户问题】
在最具影响力的用户发布的所有帖子中，识别得分超过50的帖子所占的百分比。
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN `T2`.`Score` > 50 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`T1`.`Id`)
FROM `users` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `posts` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`Id` = `T2`.`OwnerUserId`
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT
    MAX(`Reputation`) AS `max_reputation`
  FROM `users`

  `BountyAmount` BIGINT COMMENT 'the amount of bounty'
);

【参考信息】
有1条评论的帖子指的是 CommentCount = 1;

【用户问题】
在有1条评论的帖子中，有多少条评论的分数为0？
output:
SELECT
  COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `comments` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `posts` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`PostId` = `T2`.`Id`
WHERE
  `T2`.`CommentCount` = 1 AND `T2`.`Score` = 0

meta.original_question: In posts with 1 comment, how many of the comments have 0 score?
meta.original_evidence: in posts with 1 comment refers to CommentCount = 1;

instruction: 请你接下来一步步思考，写出正确的SQL查询语句以满足用户的需求。
input:
你是一名MySQL专家，现在需要阅读并理解下面的【数据库schema】描述，以及可能用到的【参考信息】，并运用MySQL知识生成sql语句回答【用户问题】。
【用户问题】
在所有 Score 在 5 到 10 之间的评论中，UpVotes 为 0 的用户所占的百分比是多少？

【数据库schema】
CREATE TABLE `badges` (
  `Id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the badge id',
  `UserId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique id of the user',
  `Name` TEXT COMMENT 'the badge name the user obtained',
  `Date` TEXT COMMENT 'the date that the user obtained the badge'
);
CREATE TABLE `comments` (
  `Id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the comment Id',
  `PostId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique id of the post',
  `Score` BIGINT COMMENT 'rating score; commonsense evidence:
The score is from 0 to 100. The score more than 60 refers that the comment is a positive comment. The score less than 60 refers that the comment is a negative comment.',
  `Text` TEXT COMMENT 'the detailed content of the comment',
  `CreationDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the creation date of the comment',
  `UserId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the user who post the comment',
  `UserDisplayName` TEXT COMMENT 'users display name'
);
CREATE TABLE `postHistory` (
  `Id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the post history id',
  `PostHistoryTypeId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the post history type',
  `PostId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique id of the post',
  `RevisionGUID` BIGINT COMMENT 'the revision globally unique id of the post',
  `CreationDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the creation date of the post',
  `UserId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the user who post the post',
  `Text` TEXT COMMENT 'the detailed content of the post',
  `Comment` TEXT COMMENT 'comments of the post',
  `UserDisplayName` TEXT COMMENT 'users display name'
);
CREATE TABLE `postLinks` (
  `Id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the post link id',
  `CreationDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the creation date of the post link',
  `PostId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the post id',
  `RelatedPostId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the related post',
  `LinkTypeId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the link type'
);
CREATE TABLE `posts` (
  `Id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the post id',
  `PostTypeId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the post type',
  `AcceptedAnswerId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the accepted answer id of the post',
  `CreaionDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the creation date of the post',
  `Score` BIGINT COMMENT 'the score of the post',
  `ViewCount` BIGINT COMMENT 'the view count of the post; commonsense evidence:
Higher view count means the post has higher popularity',
  `Body` TEXT COMMENT 'the body of the post',
  `OwnerUserId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the owner user',
  `LasActivityDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the last activity date',
  `Title` TEXT COMMENT 'the title of the post',
  `Tags` TEXT COMMENT 'the tag of the post',
  `AnswerCount` BIGINT COMMENT 'the total number of answers of the post',
  `CommentCount` BIGINT COMMENT 'the total number of comments of the post',
  `FavoriteCount` BIGINT COMMENT 'the total number of favorites of the post; commonsense evidence:
more favorite count refers to more valuable posts.',
  `LastEditorUserId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the last editor',
  `LastEditDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the last edit date',
  `CommunityOwnedDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the community owned date',
  `ParentId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the parent post; commonsense evidence:
If the parent id is null, the post is the root post. Otherwise, the post is the child post of other post.',
  `ClosedDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the closed date of the post; commonsense evidence:
if ClosedDate is null or empty, it means this post is not well-finished
if CloseDate is not null or empty, it means this post has well-finished.',
  `OwnerDisplayName` TEXT COMMENT 'the display name of the post owner',
  `LastEditorDisplayName` TEXT COMMENT 'the display name of the last editor'
);
CREATE TABLE `tags` (
  `Id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the tag id',
  `TagName` TEXT COMMENT 'the name of the tag',
  `Count` BIGINT COMMENT 'the count of posts that contain this tag; more counts --> this tag is more popular',
  `ExcerptPostId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the excerpt post id of the tag',
  `WikiPostId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the wiki post id of the tag'
);
CREATE TABLE `users` (
  `Id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the user id',
  `Reputation` BIGINT COMMENT 'the users reputation; commonsense evidence:
The user with higher reputation has more influence.',
  `CreationDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the creation date of the user account',
  `DisplayName` TEXT COMMENT 'the users display name',
  `LastAccessDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the last access date of the user account',
  `WebsiteUrl` TEXT COMMENT 'the website url of the user account',
  `Location` TEXT COMMENT 'users location',
  `AboutMe` TEXT COMMENT 'the self introduction of the user',
  `Views` BIGINT COMMENT 'the number of views',
  `UpVotes` BIGINT COMMENT 'the number of upvotes',
  `DownVotes` BIGINT COMMENT 'the number of downvotes',
  `AccountId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the unique id of the account',
  `Age` BIGINT COMMENT 'users age;  teenager: 13-18
 adult: 19-65
 elder: > 65',
  `ProfileImageUrl` TEXT COMMENT 'the profile image url'
);
CREATE TABLE `votes` (
  `Id` BIGINT COMMENT 'the vote id',
  `PostId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the post that is voted',
  `VoteTypeId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the vote type',
  `CreationDate` TEXT COMMENT 'the creation date of the vote',
  `UserId` BIGINT COMMENT 'the id of the voter',
  `BountyAmount` BIGINT COMMENT 'the amount of bounty'
);

【参考信息】
percentage = 将 (COUNT(UserId，条件为 UpVotes = 0 且 Score BETWEEN 5 and 10)) 除以 (COUNT(UserId，条件为 Score BETWEEN 5 and 10))，再乘以 100。

【用户问题】
在所有 Score 在 5 到 10 之间的评论中，UpVotes 为 0 的用户所占的百分比是多少？
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN `T1`.`UpVotes` = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`T1`.`Id`) AS `per`
FROM `users` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `comments` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`Id` = `T2`.`UserId`
WHERE
  `T2`.`Score` BETWEEN 5 AND 10

meta.original_question: Among the comments with scores between 5 to 10, what is the percentage of the users with 0 up votes?
meta.original_evidence: percentage = DIVIDE(COUNT(UserId where UpVotes = 0 and Score BETWEEN 5 and 10))*100, (COUNT(UserId where Score BETWEEN 5 and 10));
meta.question_cn: 在所有 Score 在 5 到 10 之间的评论中，UpVotes 为 0 的用户所占的百分比是多少？
meta.evidence_cn: percentage = 将 (COUNT(UserId，条件为 UpVotes = 0 且 Score BETWEEN 5 and 10)) 除以 (COUNT(UserId，条件为 Score BETWEEN 5 and 10))，再乘以 100。

CREATE TABLE `cards` (

commonsense evidence:
positive maximum hand size: +1, +2, ....

neural maximum hand size: 0....',

commonsense evidence:
Cards with this property may have missing or degraded properties and values.',

manaCost is unconverted mana cost',

null or * refers to unknown power',

if the value is null or empty, then it doesnt appear on Magic: The Gathering Online',

  `totalSetSize` BIGINT COMMENT 'The total number of cards in the set, including promotional and related supplemental products but excluding Alchemy modifications - however those cards are included in the set itself.',
  `type` TEXT COMMENT 'The expansion type of the set.; "alchemy", "archenemy", "arsenal", "box", "commander", "core", "draft_innovation", "duel_deck", "expansion", "from_the_vault", "funny", "masterpiece", "masters", "memorabilia", "planechase", "premium_deck", "promo", "spellbook", "starter", "token", "treasure_chest", "vanguard"'
);

【参考信息】

【用户问题】
哪些卡牌拥有极其强大的闪卡版本？
output:
SELECT
  `id`
FROM `cards`
WHERE
  NOT `cardKingdomFoilId` IS NULL AND NOT `cardKingdomId` IS NULL

哪些无边框卡牌没有强力闪卡版本可用？

神话稀有度卡牌指 rarity = 'mythic'; 被禁用的卡牌指 status = 'Banned'; 角斗士格式指 format = 'gladiator';

【用户问题】
列出所有在角斗士(Gladiator)格式中被禁用的神话稀有度卡牌。
output:
SELECT DISTINCT
  `T1`.`id`
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `legalities` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T2`.`format` = 'gladiator'
  AND `T2`.`status` = 'Banned'
  AND `T1`.`rarity` = 'mythic'

meta.original_question: List all the mythic rarity print cards banned in gladiator format.
meta.original_evidence: mythic rarity printing refers to rarity = 'mythic'; card banned refers to status = 'Banned'; in gladiator format refers to format = 'gladiator';

【用户问题】
对于不具有同卡多面的人工物类型的卡牌，说明其在复古(vintage)游戏格式中的合法性状态。
output:
SELECT DISTINCT
  `T2`.`status`
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `legalities` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T1`.`type` = 'Artifact' AND `T2`.`format` = 'vintage' AND `T1`.`side` IS NULL

meta.original_question: For artifact type of cards that do not have multiple faces on the same card, state its legalities status for vintage play format.
meta.original_evidence: Artifact type of cards refers to types = 'Artifact'; card does not have multiple faces on the same card refers to side is NULL'; vintage play format refers to format = 'vintage';

【参考信息】
未知力量指的是power = '*'或POWER IS NULL；指挥官游玩格式指的是format = 'commander'；在指挥官游玩格式中合法指的是format = 'commander'且status = 'Legal'

【用户问题】
列出所有具有未知力量且在指挥官格式中合法的卡牌的id和艺术家。
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`id`,
  `T1`.`artist`
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `legalities` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T2`.`status` = 'Legal'
  AND `T2`.`format` = 'commander'
  AND (
    `T1`.`power` IS NULL OR `T1`.`power` = '*'
  )

meta.original_question: List all the card id and artist with unknown power which are legal for commander play format.
meta.original_evidence: unknown power refers to power = '*' or POWER IS NULL; commander play format refers to format = 'commander'; legal for commander play format refers to format = 'commander' where status = 'Legal'

  `power` TEXT COMMENT 'The power of the card.; commonsense evidence:
∞ means infinite power
null or * refers to unknown power',

if this value is empty, then it means this card doesnt have multiple faces on the same card.',

list of all types should be the union of subtypes and supertypes',

【参考信息】
卡牌具有缺失或降级的属性和值指hasContentWarning = 1；'Stephen Daniel'是artist；查找所有卡牌指返回card id

【用户问题】
查找由Stephen Daniel绘制的所有卡牌，并描述这些卡牌的规则文本。说明这些卡牌是否具有缺失或降级的属性和值。
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`id`,
  `T2`.`text`,
  `T1`.`hasContentWarning`
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `rulings` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T1`.`artist` = 'Stephen Daniele'

meta.original_question: Find all cards illustrated by Stephen Daniel and describe the text of the ruling of these cards. State if these cards have missing or degraded properties and values.
meta.original_evidence: cards have missing or degraded properties and value refers to hasContentWarning = 1; 'Stephen Daniele' is artist; Find all cards refers to return card id

  `mcmId` BIGINT COMMENT 'The Magic Card Marketset identifier.',
  `mcmIdExtras` BIGINT COMMENT 'The split Magic Card Market set identifier if a set is printed in two sets. This identifier represents the second sets identifier.',
  `mcmName` TEXT,
  `mtgoCode` TEXT COMMENT 'The set code for the set as it appears on Magic: The Gathering Online; commonsense evidence:
if the value is null or empty, then it doesnt appear on Magic: The Gathering Online',
  `name` TEXT COMMENT 'The name of the set.',
  `parentCode` TEXT COMMENT 'The parent set code for set variations like promotions, guild kits, etc.',
  `releaseDate` TEXT COMMENT 'The release date in ISO 8601 format for the set.',
  `tcgplayerGroupId` BIGINT COMMENT 'The group identifier of the set on TCGplayer',
  `totalSetSize` BIGINT COMMENT 'The total number of cards in the set, including promotional and related supplemental products but excluding Alchemy modifications - however those cards are included in the set itself.',
  `type` TEXT COMMENT 'The expansion type of the set.; "alchemy", "archenemy", "arsenal", "box", "commander", "core", "draft_innovation", "duel_deck", "expansion", "from_the_vault", "funny", "masterpiece", "masters", "memorabilia", "planechase", "premium_deck", "promo", "spellbook", "starter", "token", "treasure_chest", "vanguard"'
);

【参考信息】
拥有最多规则信息是指 Max(count(rulings.uuid))；卡牌是宣传版印刷是指 isPromo = 1；

【用户问题】
找出拥有最多规则信息的卡牌和艺术家的名称。同时说明该卡牌是否是宣传版印刷。
output: SELECT `T1`.`name`, `T1`.`artist`, `T1`.`isPromo` FROM `cards` AS `T1` INNER JOIN `rulings` AS `T2` ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid` WHERE `T1`.`isPromo` = 1 AND `T1`.`artist` = ( SELECT `artist` FROM `cards` WHERE `isPromo` = 1 GROUP BY `artist` HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT `uuid`) = (SELECT MAX(card_counts.max_count) FROM (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT `uuid`) AS max_count FROM `cards` WHERE `isPromo` = 1 GROUP BY `artist`) AS card_counts))LIMIT 1

meta.original_question: Name the card and artist with the most ruling information. Also state if the card is a promotional printing.
meta.original_evidence: with the most ruling information refers to Max(count(rulings.uuid)); the card is the promotional printing refers to isPromo = 1;
meta.question_cn: 找出拥有最多规则信息的卡牌和艺术家的名称。同时说明该卡牌是否是宣传版印刷。
meta.evidence_cn: 拥有最多规则信息是指 Max(count(rulings.uuid))；卡牌是宣传版印刷是指 isPromo = 1；

  `mcmName` TEXT,
  `mtgoCode` TEXT COMMENT 'The set code for the set as it appears on Magic: The Gathering Online; commonsense evidence:
if the value is null or empty, then it doesnt appear on Magic: The Gathering Online',
  `name` TEXT COMMENT 'The name of the set.',
  `parentCode` TEXT COMMENT 'The parent set code for set variations like promotions, guild kits, etc.',

  `type` TEXT COMMENT 'The expansion type of the set.; "alchemy", "archenemy", "arsenal", "box", "commander", "core", "draft_innovation", "duel_deck", "expansion", "from_the_vault", "funny", "masterpiece", "masters", "memorabilia", "planechase", "premium_deck", "promo", "spellbook", "starter", "token", "treasure_chest", "vanguard"'
);

【参考信息】
'Chinese Simplified' 是语言；百分比 = 将(Sum(id where language = 'Chinese Simplified'), Count(id)) 除法 *100

【用户问题】
计算简体中文语言的卡牌百分比。
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN `T2`.`language` = 'Chinese Simplified' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `foreign_data` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`

meta.original_question: Calculate the percentage of the cards availabe in Chinese Simplified.
meta.original_evidence: Chinese Simplified' is the language; percentage = Divide(Sum(id where language = 'Chinese Simplified'), Count(id)) *100
meta.question_cn: 计算简体中文语言的卡牌百分比。
meta.evidence_cn: 'Chinese Simplified' 是语言；百分比 = 将(Sum(id where language = 'Chinese Simplified'), Count(id)) 除法 *100

【用户问题】
牌“Benalish Knight”在什么赛制中可以使用？
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`format`
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `legalities` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T1`.`name` = 'Benalish Knight'

无边框卡牌是指 borderColor = 'borderless' 的卡牌；百分比 = 除法(统计 borderColor = 'borderless' 的 id 数量，统计 id 总数) * 100

【用户问题】
无边框卡牌的百分比是多少？
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN `borderColor` = 'borderless' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`id`)
FROM `cards`

【参考信息】
故事聚焦卡牌是指 isStorySpotlight = 1；法语是语言；百分比 = 除法(计数(id) 其中 language = 'French' 且 isStorySpotlight = 1，计数(id) 其中 isStorySpotlight = 1)*100

【用户问题】
在故事聚焦卡牌中，语言为法语的卡牌所占的百分比是多少？
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN `T2`.`language` = 'French' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `foreign_data` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T1`.`isStorySpotlight` = 1

meta.original_question: What is the percentage of cards whose language is French among the Story Spotlight cards?
meta.original_evidence: Story Spotlight card refers to isStorySpotlight = 1; French is the language; Percentage = Divide(Count(id) where language = 'French' and isStorySpotlight = 1, Count(id) where isStorySpotlight = 1)*100
meta.question_cn: 在故事聚焦卡牌中，语言为法语的卡牌所占的百分比是多少？

被禁用的牌是指 status = 'Banned'；白色边框是指 borderColor = 'white'；

【用户问题】
有多少张被禁用的牌是白色边框？
output:
SELECT
  COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `legalities` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T2`.`status` = 'Banned' AND `T1`.`borderColor` = 'white'

meta.original_question: How many of the banned cards are white border?
meta.original_evidence: banned card refers to status = 'Banned'; white border refers to borderColor = 'white';

meta.evidence_cn: 被禁用的牌是指 status = 'Banned'；白色边框是指 borderColor = 'white'；

人工制品卡牌指 originalType = 'Artifact'；黑色指 colors = 'B'；外语翻译指 foreign_data 中的 language

【用户问题】
在人工制品卡牌中，哪些是黑色的并附有外语翻译？
output:
SELECT DISTINCT
  `T1`.`name`
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `foreign_data` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T1`.`originalType` = 'Artifact' AND `T1`.`colors` = 'B'

meta.original_question: Among the Artifact cards, which are black color and comes with foreign languague translation?
meta.original_evidence: Artifact card refers to originalType = 'Artifact'; black color refers to colors = 'B'; foreign language refers to language in foreign_data

meta.evidence_cn: 人工制品卡牌指 originalType = 'Artifact'；黑色指 colors = 'B'；外语翻译指 foreign_data 中的 language

FROM `cards`

没有文本框的故事聚焦卡牌是指 isStorySpotlight = 1 且 isTextless = 0；百分比 = DIVIDE(SUM(count(id) where isStorySpotlight = 1 AND isTextless = 0), SUM(count(id))) * 100

【用户问题】
没有文本框的故事聚焦卡牌的百分比是多少？按其ID列出它们。
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN `isTextless` = 0  AND `isStorySpotlight` = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`id`)
FROM `cards`

meta.original_question: What is the percentage of Story Spotlight cards that do not have a text box? List them by their ID.
meta.original_evidence: Story Spotlight cards that do not have a text box refers to isStorySpotlight = 1 and isTextless = 0; Percentage = DIVIDE(SUM(count(id) where isStorylight = 1 AND isTextless = 0 ), SUM(count(id))) * 100

【用户问题】
Commander区块中有多少个巴西葡萄牙语翻译的系列？
output:
SELECT
  COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `sets` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `set_translations` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`code` = `T2`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`language` = 'Portuguese (Brazil)' AND `T1`.`block` = 'Commander'

meta.original_question: How many Brazilian Portuguese translated sets are inside the Commander block?

if the value is null or empty, then it doesnt appear on Magic: The Gathering Online',

);

【参考信息】
German 指语言; all types 指 subtypes、supertypes; subtypes 不为空 AND supertypes 不为空

【用户问题】
列出所有德语卡牌的类型。
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`subtypes`,
  `T1`.`supertypes`
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `foreign_data` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T2`.`language` = 'German'
  AND NOT `T1`.`subtypes` IS NULL
  AND NOT `T1`.`supertypes` IS NULL

meta.original_question: Lists all types of cards in German.
meta.original_evidence: German refer to language; all types refer to the subtypes, supertypes; subtypes is not null AND supertypes is not null

【用户问题】
有多少张未知力量的牌包含关于触发式异能的信息
output:
SELECT
  Count(DISTINCT `T1`.`id`) 
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `rulings` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
WHERE
  (
    `T1`.`power` IS NULL OR `T1`.`power` = '*'
  )
  AND `T2`.`text` LIKE '%triggered ability%'

meta.original_question: How many unknown power cards contain info about the triggered ability
meta.original_evidence: unknown power cards refers to power is null or power = '*';contain info about the triggered ability refers to text contains 'triggered ability'
meta.question_cn: 有多少张未知力量的牌包含关于触发式异能的信息
meta.evidence_cn: 未知力量的牌指的是power为null或power = '*'；包含关于触发式异能的信息指的是text中包含'triggered ability'

if the value is null or empty, then it doesnt appear on Magic: The Gathering Online',

【参考信息】
法语指 language = 'French'；黑色边框指 borderColor = 'black'

【用户问题】
什么是法语中类型为生物、普通布局且黑色边框的卡牌的外文名称，由艺术家 Matthew D. Wilson 创作？
output:
SELECT
  `name`
FROM `foreign_data`
WHERE
  `uuid` IN (
    SELECT
      `uuid`
    FROM `cards`
    WHERE
      `types` = 'Creature'
      AND `layout` = 'normal'
      AND `borderColor` = 'black'
      AND `artist` = 'Matthew D. Wilson'
  )
  AND `language` = 'French'

meta.original_question: What is the foreign name of the card in French of type Creature, normal layout and black border color, by artist Matthew D. Wilson?
meta.original_evidence: in French refers to language = 'French'; black border color refers to borderColor = 'black'

meta.evidence_cn: 法语指 language = 'French'；黑色边框指 borderColor = 'black'

【参考信息】
拥有180张卡牌指的是 baseSetSize = 180

【用户问题】
拥有180张卡牌的拉尼卡(Ravnica)区块的套牌被翻译成了哪些语言?
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`language`
FROM `sets` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `set_translations` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`code` = `T2`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T1`.`block` = 'Ravnica' AND `T1`.`baseSetSize` = 180

meta.original_question: What language is the set of 180 cards that belongs to the Ravnica block translated into?

没有内容警告是指 hasContentWarning = 0；百分比是指 DIVIDE(COUNT(hasContentWarning = 0),COUNT(ID))*100，其中 format = 'commander' AND status = 'legal'；

【用户问题】
格式为指挥官且合法状态的卡牌中，没有内容警告的卡牌占百分之几？
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN `T1`.`hasContentWarning` = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `legalities` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T2`.`format` = 'commander' AND `T2`.`status` = 'Legal'

meta.original_question: What percentage of cards with format commander and legal status do not have a content warning?
meta.original_evidence: do not have a content warning refers to hasContentWarning = 0; percentage refers to DIVIDE(COUNT(hasContentWarning = 0),COUNT(ID))*100 where format = 'commander' AND Status = 'legal';

【用户问题】
没有力量值的卡牌中，有多少百分比是法语的？
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN `T2`.`language` = 'French' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `foreign_data` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`uuid` = `T2`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T1`.`power` IS NULL OR `T1`.`power` = '*'

【参考信息】
“do not have a text box” 指的是 isTextless = 1；“proportion” 指的是 DIVIDE(COUNT(isTextless = 1 且 layout = 'normal'), COUNT(isTextless)) * 100

【用户问题】
在所有牌中，“normal” 布局下没有文字框的牌所占的比例是多少？
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN `isTextless` = 1 AND `layout` = 'normal' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(*)
FROM `cards`

meta.original_question: What proportion of cards do not have a text box with a normal layout?
meta.original_evidence: do not have a text box refers to isTextless = 1; proportion refers to DIVIDE(COUNT(Textless = 1 and layout = 'normal'),COUNT(Textless))*100
meta.question_cn: 在所有牌中，“normal” 布局下没有文字框的牌所占的比例是多少？
meta.evidence_cn: “do not have a text box” 指的是 isTextless = 1；“proportion” 指的是 DIVIDE(COUNT(isTextless = 1 且 layout = 'normal'), COUNT(isTextless)) * 100

已知名称为Archenemy且代码为ARC的魔法集合在魔法卡牌市场上有哪些语言可用？

SELECT
  `T2`.`language`
FROM `sets` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `set_translations` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`code` = `T2`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T1`.`mcmName` = 'Archenemy' AND `T2`.`setCode` = 'ARC'

【用户问题】
哪张卡牌的转换法力费用更高，"Serra Angel"还是"Shrine Keeper"？

  `name`
FROM `cards`
WHERE
  `name` IN ('Serra Angel', 'Shrine Keeper')
ORDER BY
  `convertedManaCost` DESC
LIMIT 1

“set of cards with "Ancestor''s Chosen" in it”指的是在`cards`表中满足`name = 'Ancestor''s Chosen'`的那一组牌；“Korean version”指的是在`foreign_data`表中满足`language = 'Korean'`的记录。

【用户问题】
对于包含“Ancestor's Chosen”的那一组牌来说，其中是否有韩文版本？
output:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN SUM(
      CASE
        WHEN `T2`.`language` = 'Korean' AND NOT `T2`.`translation` IS NULL
        THEN 1
        ELSE 0
      END
    ) > 0
    THEN 'YES'
    ELSE 'NO'
  END
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `set_translations` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`setCode` = `T1`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T1`.`name` = 'Ancestor''s Chosen'

meta.original_question: For the set of cards with "Ancestor's Chosen" in it, is there a Korean version of it?
meta.original_evidence: set of cards with "Ancestor''s Chosen" in it refers to name = 'Ancestor''s Chosen'; Korean version refers to language = 'Korean'

【用户问题】
在卡牌组"Hauptset Zehnte Edition"中，由Adam Rex设计的卡牌有多少张？
output:
SELECT
  COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `set_translations` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`setCode` = `T1`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`translation` = 'Hauptset Zehnte Edition' AND `T1`.`artist` = 'Adam Rex'

【参考信息】
Eighth Edition 是卡牌集合的名称，对应于 name = 'Eighth Edition'；简体中文对应于 language = 'Chinese Simplified'；名称的翻译对应于 translation。

【用户问题】
集合 name = 'Eighth Edition' 的名称在简体中文中的 translation 是什么？
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`translation`
FROM `sets` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `set_translations` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`setCode` = `T1`.`code`
WHERE
  `T1`.`name` = 'Eighth Edition' AND `T2`.`language` = 'Chinese Simplified'

meta.original_question: What is the Simplified Chinese translation of the name of the set "Eighth Edition"?
meta.original_evidence: Eighth Edition is the name of card set which refers to name = 'Eighth Edition'; Simplified Chinese refers to language = 'Chinese Simplified'; translation of the name refers to translation

【用户问题】
卡牌「怜悯天使」所属的套牌是否出现在《魔法风云会》在线版中？
output:
SELECT
  CASE WHEN NOT `T2`.`mtgoCode` IS NULL THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `sets` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`code` = `T1`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T1`.`name` = 'Angel of Mercy'

【用户问题】
在"冰河时代"这个系列中，有多少个系列有意大利语翻译？
output:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT `T1`.`id`)
FROM `sets` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `set_translations` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`setCode` = `T1`.`code`
WHERE
  `T1`.`block` = 'Ice Age'
  AND `T2`.`language` = 'Italian'
  AND NOT `T2`.`translation` IS NULL

meta.original_evidence: sets in the block "Ice Age" refers to block = 'Ice Age'; Italian translation refers to language = 'Italian' and translation is not null

【用户问题】
包含阿达卡瓦尔基里的卡牌集合是否仅在美国以外的地区发行？
output:
SELECT
  CASE WHEN `isForeignOnly` = 1 THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `sets` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`code` = `T1`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T1`.`name` = 'Adarkar Valkyrie'

【用户问题】
在拥有意大利语翻译的卡牌套装中，有多少个套装的基础套装数量少于100?
output:
SELECT
  COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `sets` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `set_translations` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`setCode` = `T1`.`code`
WHERE
  NOT `T2`.`translation` IS NULL
  AND `T1`.`baseSetSize` < 100
  AND `T2`.`language` = 'Italian'

meta.original_evidence: Italian translation refers to language = 'Italian'; have a translation means translation is not null; base set number of under 100 refers to baseSetSize < 10

【用户问题】
这些艺术家中，哪位在Coldsnap系列中设计过卡牌：Jeremy Jarvis、Aaron Miller还是Chippy？
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`artist`
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `sets` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`code` = `T1`.`setCode`
WHERE
  (
    `T2`.`name` = 'Coldsnap' AND `T1`.`artist` = 'Chippy'
  )
  OR (
    `T2`.`name` = 'Coldsnap' AND `T1`.`artist` = 'Aaron Miller'
  )
  OR (
    `T2`.`name` = 'Coldsnap' AND `T1`.`artist` = 'Jeremy Jarvis'
  )
GROUP BY
  `T1`.`artist`

meta.original_question: Which of these artists have designed a card in the set Coldsnap, Jeremy Jarvis, Aaron Miller or Chippy?
meta.original_evidence: card set Coldsnap refers to name = 'Coldsnap'; Jeremy Jarvis, Aaron Miller or Chippy are the name of artists which refers to artist IN ('Jeremy Jarvis', 'Aaron Miller','Chippy');

【用户问题】
在冷雪集合中，转化法力值高于5的卡牌中，有多少张的力量值未知？
output:
SELECT
  SUM(CASE WHEN `T1`.`power` = '*' OR `T1`.`power` IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `sets` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`code` = `T1`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`name` = 'Coldsnap' AND `T1`.`convertedManaCost` > 5

【用户问题】
请列出冰冷时节(Coldsnap)套牌中转换法力值最高的卡牌的意大利语名称。
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`name`
FROM `foreign_data` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `cards` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`uuid` = `T1`.`uuid`
INNER JOIN `sets` AS `T3`
  ON `T3`.`code` = `T2`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T3`.`name` = 'Coldsnap' AND `T1`.`language` = 'Italian'
ORDER BY
  `T2`.`convertedManaCost` DESC

【用户问题】
在Coldsnap卡组中，转换法力费用为7的卡牌占比是多少？
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN `T1`.`convertedManaCost` = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `sets` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`code` = `T1`.`setCode`
WHERE

【参考信息】
卡牌系列Coldsnap指name = 'Coldsnap'；极其强大的foil卡牌指cardKingdomFoilId不为null且cardKingdomId不为null；系列中极其强大卡牌的百分比指DIVIDE(SUM(极其强大), SUM(name = 'Coldsnap'))*100

【用户问题】
在Coldsnap系列中，极其强大的卡牌的百分比是多少？
output:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(
    CASE
      WHEN NOT `T1`.`cardKingdomFoilId` IS NULL AND NOT `T1`.`cardKingdomId` IS NULL
      THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END
  ) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`T1`.`id`)
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `sets` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`code` = `T1`.`setCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`name` = 'Coldsnap'

meta.original_question: What is the percentage of incredibly powerful cards in the set Coldsnap?
meta.original_evidence: card set Coldsnap refers to name = 'Coldsnap'; foil is incredibly powerful refers to cardKingdomFoilId is not null AND cardKingdomId is not null; the percentage of incredibly powerful cards in the set refers to DIVIDE(SUM(incredibly powerful), SUM(name = 'Coldsnap'))*100

哪个游戏格式中被禁用（banned status）的卡牌数量最多？指出该游戏格式以及满足条件的所有卡牌名称。
output: SELECT T2.format, T1.name FROM cards AS T1 INNER JOIN legalities AS T2 ON T2.uuid = T1.uuid INNER JOIN ( SELECT format FROM legalities WHERE status = 'Banned' GROUP BY format ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS MaxBanned ON MaxBanned.format = T2.format WHERE T2.status = 'Banned'

meta.original_question: Which of the play format has the highest number of banned status? Indicate the play format and the names of all the card meet the condition.
meta.original_evidence: play format refers to format; banned status refers to status = 'Banned'; the highest number of banned status refers to MAX(COUNT(status = 'Banned'))

meta.evidence_cn: 游戏格式指 format；被禁用状态指 status = 'Banned'；被禁用状态数量最多指 MAX(COUNT(status = 'Banned'))

【用户问题】
哪些卡牌在EDHRec上排名第1?列出所有卡牌的名称及其被禁用的游戏格式。
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`name`,
  `T2`.`format`
FROM `cards` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `legalities` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`uuid` = `T1`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T1`.`edhrecRank` = 1 AND `T2`.`status` = 'Banned'
GROUP BY
  `T1`.`name`,
  `T2`.`format`

set Hour of Devastation 指的是 set.name = 'Hour of Devastation'；集合中所有卡牌的名称指的是 cards.name；合法卡牌指的是 status = 'legal'；游戏格式指的是 format

【用户问题】
列出末日时刻集合中所有卡牌的名称，并找出这些卡牌合法的游戏格式。
output:
SELECT DISTINCT
  `T2`.`name`,
  CASE WHEN `T1`.`status` = 'Legal' THEN `T1`.`format` ELSE NULL END
FROM `legalities` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `cards` AS `T2`
  ON `T2`.`uuid` = `T1`.`uuid`
WHERE
  `T2`.`setCode` IN (
    SELECT
      `code`
    FROM `sets`
    WHERE
      `name` = 'Hour of Devastation'
  )

meta.original_question: List the names of all the cards in the set Hour of Devastation and find the formats in which these cards are legal.
meta.original_evidence: the set Hour of Devastation refers to set.name = 'Hour of Devastation'; names of all the cards in the set refers to cards.name; legal cards refers to status = 'Legal'; the formats refers to format

);

【参考信息】
set的名称指的是name；没有日文翻译指的是language不包含'%Japanese%'；有韩文翻译指的是language = 'Korean'

【用户问题】
查找并列出没有日文翻译但有韩文翻译的set的名称。
output:
SELECT
  `name`
FROM `sets`
WHERE
  `code` IN (
    SELECT
      `setCode`
    FROM `set_translations`
    WHERE
      `language` = 'Korean' AND NOT `language` LIKE '%Japanese%'
  )

input:
你是一名MySQL专家，现在需要阅读并理解下面的【数据库schema】描述，以及可能用到的【参考信息】，并运用MySQL知识生成sql语句回答【用户问题】。
【用户问题】
最常见的键型是什么?

【数据库schema】
CREATE TABLE `atom` (
  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'the unique id of atoms',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule to which the atom belongs; commonsense evidence:
TRXXX_i represents ith atom of molecule TRXXX',
  `element` TEXT COMMENT 'the element of the toxicology;  cl: chlorine
 c: carbon
 h: hydrogen
 o: oxygen
 s: sulfur
 n: nitrogen
 p: phosphorus
 na: sodium
 br: bromine
 f: fluorine
 i: iodine
 sn: Tin
 pb: lead
 te: tellurium
 ca: Calcium'
);
CREATE TABLE `bond` (
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id representing bonds; TRxxx_A1_A2:
TRXXX refers to which molecule
A1 and A2 refers to which atom',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule in which the bond appears',
  `bond_type` TEXT COMMENT 'type of the bond; commonsense evidence:
-: single bond
=: double bond
#: triple bond'
);
CREATE TABLE `connected` (
  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the first atom',
  `atom_id2` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the second atom',
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'bond id representing bond between two atoms'
);
CREATE TABLE `molecule` (
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id of molecule; "+" --> this molecule / compound is carcinogenic
- this molecule is not / compound carcinogenic',
  `label` TEXT COMMENT 'whether this molecule is carcinogenic or not'
);

【参考信息】
最常见的键型指 MAX(COUNT(bond_type))

【用户问题】
最常见的键型是什么?
output:
SELECT
  `T`.`bond_type`
FROM (
  SELECT
    `bond_type`,
    COUNT(`bond_id`)
  FROM `bond`
  GROUP BY
    `bond_type`
  ORDER BY
    COUNT(`bond_id`) DESC
  LIMIT 1
) AS `T`

meta.original_question: What is the most common bond type?
meta.original_evidence: most common bond type refers MAX(COUNT(bond_type))
meta.question_cn: 最常见的键型是什么?
meta.evidence_cn: 最常见的键型指 MAX(COUNT(bond_type))

input:

【数据库schema】
CREATE TABLE `atom` (
  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'the unique id of atoms',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule to which the atom belongs; commonsense evidence:
TRXXX_i represents ith atom of molecule TRXXX',
  `element` TEXT COMMENT 'the element of the toxicology;  cl: chlorine
 c: carbon
 h: hydrogen

 n: nitrogen

 na: sodium
 br: bromine

 ca: Calcium'
);

  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id representing bonds; TRxxx_A1_A2:
TRXXX refers to which molecule
A1 and A2 refers to which atom',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule in which the bond appears',
  `bond_type` TEXT COMMENT 'type of the bond; commonsense evidence:
-: single bond
=: double bond
#: triple bond'
);

);
CREATE TABLE `molecule` (

- this molecule is not / compound carcinogenic',
  `label` TEXT COMMENT 'whether this molecule is carcinogenic or not'
);

【参考信息】
仅含单键的分子是指 bond_type = '-' ; 氧原子的平均数量 = AVG(element = 'o')

【用户问题】
计算仅含单键的分子中氧原子的平均数量。
output:
SELECT
  AVG(`oxygen_count`)
FROM (
  SELECT
    `T1`.`molecule_id`,
    COUNT(`T1`.`element`) AS `oxygen_count`
  FROM `atom` AS `T1`
  INNER JOIN `bond` AS `T2`
    ON `T1`.`molecule_id` = `T2`.`molecule_id`
  WHERE
    `T2`.`bond_type` = '-' AND `T1`.`element` = 'o'
  GROUP BY
    `T1`.`molecule_id`
) AS `oxygen_counts`

meta.original_question: Calculate the average number of oxygen atoms in single-bonded molecules.

input:

平均而言，有多少个致癌分子是单键的？

【数据库schema】

TRXXX_i represents ith atom of molecule TRXXX',

 ca: Calcium'
);

  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id representing bonds; TRxxx_A1_A2:
TRXXX refers to which molecule
A1 and A2 refers to which atom',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule in which the bond appears',
  `bond_type` TEXT COMMENT 'type of the bond; commonsense evidence:
-: single bond
=: double bond
#: triple bond'
);
CREATE TABLE `connected` (
  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the first atom',
  `atom_id2` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the second atom',
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'bond id representing bond between two atoms'
);
CREATE TABLE `molecule` (

- this molecule is not / compound carcinogenic',
  `label` TEXT COMMENT 'whether this molecule is carcinogenic or not'
);

【参考信息】
致癌分子指的是 label = '+'; 单键指的是 bond_type = '-'; 平均值 = DIVIDE(SUM(bond_type = '-'), COUNT(atom_id))

【用户问题】
平均而言，有多少个致癌分子是单键的？
output:
SELECT
  AVG(`single_bond_count`)
FROM (
  SELECT
    `T3`.`molecule_id`,
    COUNT(`T1`.`bond_type`) AS `single_bond_count`
  FROM `bond` AS `T1`
  INNER JOIN `atom` AS `T2`
    ON `T1`.`molecule_id` = `T2`.`molecule_id`
  INNER JOIN `molecule` AS `T3`
    ON `T3`.`molecule_id` = `T2`.`molecule_id`
  WHERE
    `T1`.`bond_type` = '-' AND `T3`.`label` = '+'
  GROUP BY
    `T3`.`molecule_id`
) AS `subquery`

meta.original_question: On average how many carcinogenic molecules are single bonded?
meta.original_evidence: carcinogenic molecules refers to label = '+'; single-bonded refers to bond_type = '-'; average = DIVIDE(SUM(bond_type = '-'), COUNT(atom_id))
meta.question_cn: 平均而言，有多少个致癌分子是单键的？
meta.evidence_cn: 致癌分子指的是 label = '+'; 单键指的是 bond_type = '-'; 平均值 = DIVIDE(SUM(bond_type = '-'), COUNT(atom_id))

A1 and A2 refers to which atom',

【参考信息】
carbon 指的是 element = 'c'；double-bond molecules 指的是 bond_type = '='；percentage = DIVIDE(SUM(element = 'c'), COUNT(atom_id)) 表示用碳原子数量除以总原子数量来计算百分比。

【用户问题】
在具有双键的分子中，碳元素所占的百分比是多少？

SELECT
  CAST(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN `T1`.`element` = 'c' THEN `T1`.`atom_id` ELSE NULL END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(DISTINCT `T1`.`atom_id`)
FROM `atom` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `bond` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`molecule_id` = `T2`.`molecule_id`

在单键分子中，有多少个碘元素和硫元素类型的原子？

  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN `T1`.`element` = 'i' THEN `T1`.`atom_id` ELSE NULL END) AS `iodine_nums`,

FROM `atom` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `connected` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`atom_id` = `T2`.`atom_id`

#: triple bond'

);

【参考信息】
label = '+' 表示分子是致癌的；含氟指的是 element = 'f'；百分比的计算为：在 label = '+' 的条件下，用 DIVIDE(SUM(element = 'f') * 100, COUNT(molecule_id))；在进行计数时应当按不同的原子去重计算。

FROM `atom` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `molecule` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`molecule_id` = `T2`.`molecule_id`
WHERE
  `T2`.`label` = '+'

instruction: 请你接下来一步步思考，写出正确的SQL查询语句以满足用户的需求。
input:

【用户问题】
哪些键的原子元素既包含磷又包含氮？

【数据库schema】
CREATE TABLE `atom` (
  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'the unique id of atoms',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule to which the atom belongs; commonsense evidence:
TRXXX_i represents ith atom of molecule TRXXX',
  `element` TEXT COMMENT 'the element of the toxicology;  cl: chlorine
 c: carbon
 h: hydrogen
 o: oxygen
 s: sulfur
 n: nitrogen
 p: phosphorus
 na: sodium
 br: bromine
 f: fluorine
 i: iodine
 sn: Tin
 pb: lead
 te: tellurium
 ca: Calcium'
);
CREATE TABLE `bond` (
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id representing bonds; TRxxx_A1_A2:
TRXXX refers to which molecule
A1 and A2 refers to which atom',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule in which the bond appears',
  `bond_type` TEXT COMMENT 'type of the bond; commonsense evidence:
-: single bond
=: double bond
#: triple bond'
);
CREATE TABLE `connected` (
  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the first atom',
  `atom_id2` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the second atom',
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'bond id representing bond between two atoms'
);
CREATE TABLE `molecule` (
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id of molecule; "+" --> this molecule / compound is carcinogenic
- this molecule is not / compound carcinogenic',
  `label` TEXT COMMENT 'whether this molecule is carcinogenic or not'
);

【参考信息】
包含磷作为原子元素是指 element = 'p'；包含氮作为原子元素是指 element = 'n'

【用户问题】
哪些键的原子元素既包含磷又包含氮？
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`bond_id`
FROM `atom` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `connected` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`atom_id` = `T2`.`atom_id`
WHERE
  `T2`.`bond_id` IN (
    SELECT
      `T3`.`bond_id`
    FROM `connected` AS `T3`
    INNER JOIN `atom` AS `T4`
      ON `T3`.`atom_id` = `T4`.`atom_id`
    WHERE
      `T4`.`element` = 'p'
  )
  AND `T1`.`element` = 'n'

meta.original_question: What are the bonds that have phosphorus and nitrogen as their atom elements?
meta.original_evidence: have phosphorus as atom elements refers to element = 'p'; have nitrogen as atom elements refers to element = 'n'

meta.evidence_cn: 包含磷作为原子元素是指 element = 'p'；包含氮作为原子元素是指 element = 'n'

【数据库schema】

  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'the unique id of atoms',

 n: nitrogen
 p: phosphorus
 na: sodium
 br: bromine
 f: fluorine
 i: iodine
 sn: Tin
 pb: lead
 te: tellurium
 ca: Calcium'
);
CREATE TABLE `bond` (
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id representing bonds; TRxxx_A1_A2:
TRXXX refers to which molecule
A1 and A2 refers to which atom',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule in which the bond appears',
  `bond_type` TEXT COMMENT 'type of the bond; commonsense evidence:
-: single bond
=: double bond
#: triple bond'
);
CREATE TABLE `connected` (
  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the first atom',
  `atom_id2` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the second atom',
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'bond id representing bond between two atoms'
);
CREATE TABLE `molecule` (
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id of molecule; "+" --> this molecule / compound is carcinogenic
- this molecule is not / compound carcinogenic',
  `label` TEXT COMMENT 'whether this molecule is carcinogenic or not'
);

【参考信息】
双键指的是 bond_type = ' = '; label = '+' 表示分子具有致癌性

【用户问题】
拥有最多双键的分子是否具有致癌性?
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`label`
FROM `molecule` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT
    `T`.`molecule_id`,
    COUNT(`T`.`bond_type`)
  FROM `bond` AS `T`
  WHERE
    `T`.`bond_type` = '='
  GROUP BY
    `T`.`molecule_id`
  ORDER BY
    COUNT(`T`.`bond_type`) DESC
  LIMIT 1
) AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`molecule_id` = `T2`.`molecule_id`

meta.original_evidence: double bond refers to bond_type = ' = '; label = '+' mean molecules are carcinogenic

  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'unique id representing bonds; TRxxx_A1_A2:
TRXXX refers to which molecule
A1 and A2 refers to which atom',
  `molecule_id` TEXT COMMENT 'identifying the molecule in which the bond appears',
  `bond_type` TEXT COMMENT 'type of the bond; commonsense evidence:
-: single bond
=: double bond
#: triple bond'
);

  `atom_id` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the first atom',
  `atom_id2` TEXT COMMENT 'id of the second atom',
  `bond_id` TEXT COMMENT 'bond id representing bond between two atoms'

氯元素指的是 element = 'cl'；单键指的是 bond_type = '-'；百分比 = DIVIDE(SUM(element = 'cl'), COUNT(atom_id)) as percent where bond_type = '-'

【用户问题】
在单键分子中，氯元素的组成百分比是多少？

SELECT
  CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN `T`.`element` = 'cl' THEN `T`.`atom_id` ELSE NULL END) AS DOUBLE) * 100 / COUNT(`T`.`atom_id`)
FROM (
  SELECT
    `T1`.`atom_id`,
    `T1`.`element`
  FROM `atom` AS `T1`
  INNER JOIN `molecule` AS `T2`
    ON `T1`.`molecule_id` = `T2`.`molecule_id`
  INNER JOIN `bond` AS `T3`
    ON `T2`.`molecule_id` = `T3`.`molecule_id`

    `T3`.`bond_type` = '-'
) AS `T`

label = '-' 表示分子是非致癌的; 包含超过5个原子的分子是指 COUNT(molecule_id) > 5

【用户问题】
哪些非致癌分子包含超过5个原子?
output:
SELECT
  `T`.`molecule_id`
FROM (
  SELECT
    `T1`.`molecule_id`,
    COUNT(`T2`.`atom_id`)
  FROM `molecule` AS `T1`
  INNER JOIN `atom` AS `T2`
    ON `T1`.`molecule_id` = `T2`.`molecule_id`
  WHERE
    `T1`.`label` = '-'
  GROUP BY
    `T1`.`molecule_id`
  HAVING
    COUNT(`T2`.`atom_id`) > 5
) AS `t`

meta.original_question: Which non-carcinogenic molecules consisted more than 5 atoms?
meta.original_evidence: label = '-' means molecules are non-carcinogenic; molecules consisted more than 5 atoms refers to COUNT(molecule_id) > 5
meta.question_cn: 哪些非致癌分子包含超过5个原子?
meta.evidence_cn: label = '-' 表示分子是非致癌的; 包含超过5个原子的分子是指 COUNT(molecule_id) > 5

output: SELECT  COUNT(DISTINCT `T2`.`School`) FROM `satscores` AS `T1` INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`  ON `T1`.`cds` = `T2`.`CDSCode` WHERE  `T2`.`Virtual` = 'F' AND `T1`.`AvgScrMath` > 400

【参考信息】
卓越率 = NumGE1500 / NumTstTakr；5-17岁学生的免费餐资格率 = `Free Meal Count (Ages 5-17)` / `Enrollment (Ages 5-17)`

【用户问题】
在SAT卓越率超过0.3的学校中，5-17岁学生的最高免费餐资格率是多少？
output:
SELECT
  MAX(
    CAST(`T1`.`Free Meal Count (Ages 5-17)` AS DOUBLE) / `T1`.`Enrollment (Ages 5-17)`
  )
FROM `frpm` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `satscores` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`cds`
WHERE
  CAST(`T2`.`NumGE1500` AS DOUBLE) / `T2`.`NumTstTakr` > 0.3

meta.original_question: Among the schools with an SAT excellence rate of over 0.3, what is the highest eligible free rate for students aged 5-17?
meta.original_evidence: Excellence rate = NumGE1500 / NumTstTakr; Eligible free rates for students aged 5-17 = `Free Meal Count (Ages 5-17)` / `Enrollment (Ages 5-17)`

【参考信息】
有效的特许学校编号意味着该编号不为空

【用户问题】
排名平均写作分数大于499的学校，显示其特许学校编号。
output:
SELECT
  `CharterNum`,
  `AvgScrWrite`,
  RANK() OVER (ORDER BY `AvgScrWrite` DESC) AS `WritingScoreRank`
FROM `schools` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `satscores` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`cds`
WHERE
  `T2`.`AvgScrWrite` > 499 AND NOT `CharterNum` IS NULL

meta.original_question: Rank schools by their average score in Writing where the score is greater than 499, showing their charter numbers.
meta.original_evidence: Valid charter number means the number is not null

招生人数差异 = `Enrollment (K-12)` - `Enrollment (Ages 5-17)`

【用户问题】
列出K-12和5-17岁年龄段招生人数差异超过30的学校名称。请同时提供这些学校的完整街道地址。
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`School`,
  `T1`.`Street`
FROM `schools` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `frpm` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`Enrollment (K-12)` - `T2`.`Enrollment (Ages 5-17)` > 30

免费餐食合格比例 = Free Meal Count (K-12) / Total (Enrollment (K-12))

【用户问题】
给出K-12年级中免费餐食合格比例超过0.1且SAT考试成绩大于等于1500的考生数量大于0的学校名称?
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`School Name`
FROM `satscores` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `frpm` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`cds` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  CAST(`T2`.`Free Meal Count (K-12)` AS DOUBLE) / `T2`.`Enrollment (K-12)` > 0.1
  AND `T1`.`NumGE1500` > 0

meta.original_question: Give the names of the schools with the percent eligible for free meals in K-12 is more than 0.1 and test takers whose test score is greater than or equal to 1500?
meta.original_evidence: Percent eligible for free meals = Free Meal Count (K-12) / Total (Enrollment (K-12)

【参考信息】
平均数学成绩的平均值 = 数学成绩之和 / 学校数量

【用户问题】
列出河滨县(Riverside)中SAT平均数学成绩的平均值大于400的学校,这些学校的资金类型是什么?
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`sname`,
  `T2`.`Charter Funding Type`
FROM `satscores` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `frpm` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`cds` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`District Name` LIKE 'Riverside%'
GROUP BY
  `T1`.`sname`,
  `T2`.`Charter Funding Type`
HAVING
  CAST(SUM(`T1`.`AvgScrMath`) AS DOUBLE) / COUNT(`T1`.`cds`) > 400

meta.original_question: Name schools in Riverside which the average of average math score for SAT is grater than 400, what is the funding type of these schools?
meta.original_evidence: Average of average math = sum(average math scores) / count(schools).
meta.question_cn: 列出河滨县(Riverside)中SAT平均数学成绩的平均值大于400的学校,这些学校的资金类型是什么?
meta.evidence_cn: 平均数学成绩的平均值 = 数学成绩之和 / 学校数量

【用户问题】
列出蒙特雷县拥有超过800份免费或降价餐食（15-17岁年龄段）的高中的名称和完整通讯地址？
output:
SELECT
  `T1`.`School Name`,
  `T2`.`Street`,
  `T2`.`City`,
  `T2`.`State`,
  `T2`.`Zip`
FROM `frpm` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`County` = 'Monterey'
  AND `T1`.`Free Meal Count (Ages 5-17)` > 800
  AND `T1`.`School Type` = 'High Schools (Public)'

meta.original_question: State the names and full communication address of high schools in Monterey which has more than 800 free or reduced price meals for ages 15-17?
meta.original_evidence: Full communication address should include Street, City, State and zip code if any.

meta.evidence_cn: 完整通讯地址应包括街道、城市、州和邮编（如有）。

对于1991年后开校或2000年前关闭的学校，写作平均分是多少？列出学校名称和分数。如果有的话，也列出学校的通讯号码。
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`School`,
  `T1`.`AvgScrWrite`,
  `T2`.`Phone`
FROM `schools` AS `T2`
LEFT JOIN `satscores` AS `T1`
  ON `T2`.`CDSCode` = `T1`.`cds`
WHERE
  DATE_FORMAT(CAST(`T2`.`OpenDate` AS DATETIME), '%Y') > '1991'
  OR DATE_FORMAT(CAST(`T2`.`ClosedDate` AS DATETIME), '%Y') < '2000'

meta.original_evidence: Communication number refers to phone number.

【参考信息】
K-12招生人数与5-17岁招生人数之间的差异可通过 `Enrollment (K-12)` - `Enrollment (Ages 5-17)` 计算

【用户问题】
考虑当地资助学校的K-12招生人数与5-17岁招生人数之间的平均差异，列出差异高于此平均值的学校名称和DOC类型。
output:
SELECT
  `T2`.`School`,
  `T2`.`DOC`
FROM `frpm` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`FundingType` = 'Locally funded'
  AND (
    `T1`.`Enrollment (K-12)` - `T1`.`Enrollment (Ages 5-17)`
  ) > (
    SELECT
      AVG(`T3`.`Enrollment (K-12)` - `T3`.`Enrollment (Ages 5-17)`)
    FROM `frpm` AS `T3`
    INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T4`
      ON `T3`.`CDSCode` = `T4`.`CDSCode`
    WHERE
      `T4`.`FundingType` = 'Locally funded'
  )

meta.original_question: Consider the average difference between K-12 enrollment and 15-17 enrollment of schools that are locally funded, list the names and DOC type of schools which has a difference above this average.
meta.original_evidence: Difference between K-12 enrollment and 15-17 enrollment can be computed by `Enrollment (K-12)` - `Enrollment (Ages 5-17)`
meta.question_cn: 考虑当地资助学校的K-12招生人数与5-17岁招生人数之间的平均差异，列出差异高于此平均值的学校名称和DOC类型。
meta.evidence_cn: K-12招生人数与5-17岁招生人数之间的差异可通过 `Enrollment (K-12)` - `Enrollment (Ages 5-17)` 计算

【用户问题】
在1至12年级的学生中，入学人数最多的学校里排名第10和第11的学校的可获免费率各是多少？
output:
SELECT
  CAST(`Free Meal Count (K-12)` AS DOUBLE) / `Enrollment (K-12)`
FROM `frpm`
ORDER BY
  `Enrollment (K-12)` DESC
LIMIT 2
OFFSET 9

meta.original_question: What is the eligible free rate of the 10th and 11th schools with the highest enrolment for students in grades 1 through 12?
meta.original_evidence: K-12 refers to students in grades 1 through 12; Eligible free rate for K-12 = `Free Meal Count (K-12)` / `Enrollment (K-12)`
meta.question_cn: 在1至12年级的学生中，入学人数最多的学校里排名第10和第11的学校的可获免费率各是多少？
meta.evidence_cn: K-12 指1至12年级的学生；K-12 的可获免费率 = `Free Meal Count (K-12)` / `Enrollment (K-12)`

【参考信息】
1-12 年级表示 K-12；K-12 的合格免费或降价餐点率 = `FRPM Count (K-12)` / `Enrollment (K-12)`

【用户问题】
对于所有权代码为 66 的学校中，1-12 年级免费或降价餐点数最多的前 5 所学校，它们的合格免费或降价餐点率是多少？
output:
SELECT
  CAST(`T1`.`FRPM Count (K-12)` AS DOUBLE) / `T1`.`Enrollment (K-12)`
FROM `frpm` AS `T1`
INNER JOIN `schools` AS `T2`
  ON `T1`.`CDSCode` = `T2`.`CDSCode`
WHERE
  `T2`.`SOC` = 66
ORDER BY
  `T1`.`FRPM Count (K-12)` DESC
LIMIT 5

meta.original_question: What is the eligible free or reduced price meal rate for the top 5 schools in grades 1-12 with the highest free or reduced price meal count of the schools with the ownership code 66?
meta.original_evidence: grades 1-12 means K-12; Eligible free or reduced price meal rate for K-12 = `FRPM Count (K-12)` / `Enrollment (K-12)`
